    Class
    Description
    class 
    CheckerFunction<T,R>
    A specialized checker for Function instances, providing a fluent API for validating function behavior and results.
    Methods in com.luchersol.core.specialized_checkers.lambda that return CheckerFunction
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    CheckerFunction<T,R>
    CheckerFunction.activateDeepClone()
    Enables deep cloning of input objects before passing them to the Function.
    CheckerFunction<T,R>
    CheckerFunction.applyWithoutException(T input)
    Asserts that applying the Function to the given input does not throw any exception.
    static <T, R> CheckerFunction<T,R>
    CheckerFunction.check(Function<T,R> function)
    Creates a new CheckerFunction for the given Function instance with a default name.
    static <T, R> CheckerFunction<T,R>
    CheckerFunction.check(Function<T,R> function, String name)
    Creates a new CheckerFunction for the given Function instance with a custom name.
    CheckerFunction<T,R>
    CheckerFunction.deactivateDeepClone()
    Disables deep cloning of input objects before passing them to the Function.
    CheckerFunction<T,R>
    CheckerFunction.producesExpected(T input, R expected)
    Asserts that applying the Function to the given input produces the expected result.
    CheckerFunction<T,R>
    CheckerFunction.producesNonNull(T input)
    Asserts that applying the Function to the given input produces a non-null result.
    protected CheckerFunction<T,R>
    CheckerFunction.self()
    Returns this checker instance (for fluent API usage).
